frontEndProjects.title: TekWave
frontEndProjects.description: A modern and responsive event dashboard showcasing ongoing technology events. Features include interactive event cards, dynamic viewer counts, and a sleek design built with React. Ready for MongoDB integration and admin management.

frontEndProjects.title: Money Bank
frontEndProjects.description:
A secure, interactive online bank, my most significant project. The design is simple but followed expectations and the mock-up provided, aiming to test my abilities to know how to make back-end and front-end interact.

To fully explore the features, deploy it locally from GitHub.

frontEndProjects.title: Kasa App
frontEndProjects.description:
A real estate rental app. This was my first project with React. I discovered the importance of components and the different options this framework offers for dynamism and optimization. In particular, the use of React Router, which offers a smoother user experience between pages and is adapted to redirections.

This project strictly follows the mockup provided.
